ca.ubc.magic.icd.web.services
Class UserService

java.lang.Object
  ca.ubc.magic.icd.web.services.UserService

public class UserService
extends Object

A class for getting the user from the SecurityContextHolder and getting the status of the link to a MAGIC account

Author:
Jeffrey Payan, Stephen Kidson

Constructor Detail

UserService

public UserService()
Method Detail

addUserContext

public static void addUserContext(Map<String,Object> model)
Create a new user based on the current user logged into the application and add it to the model for the current page being viewed. This method gets the username from the SecurityContextHolder.

Parameters:
model - - the model to add the user to

initUserContext

public static Map<String,Object> initUserContext(LinkManager linkManager)
Create a new user based on the current user logged into the application and add it to the model for the current page being viewed. Also adds the current "Linked" status to the model.This method gets the username from the SecurityContextHolder.

Parameters:
model - - the model to add the user to
Returns:
A model with the new user and linked object added to it.
See Also:
Linked

authenticate

public static boolean authenticate(String username,
                                   String password)
